title: Echoes Become Oracles
outcome: The mythic 'Halden Echoes' are turned into a civic AI oracle, guiding public debate and protest. As citizens start trusting the Echo above all, Council factions scramble, fearing they've lost control for good.

events.description: A group of citizens code 'Halden Echoes' into an accessible AI oracle, launching open forums for advice on life and resistance.
Crowds gather nightly to ask the AI oracle for guidance on justice and reform. The system's cryptic but empowering answers spread rapidly.
Council factions clash over how to respond to the oracle. Some push to discredit it, fearing it erodes all central authority; others sense opportunity in its popularity.
Citizens increasingly act on the oracle’s pronouncements instead of Council messages. Underground groups begin using it to organize peaceful disruptions.
Citywide debate erupts as divisions emerge—some worship the 'Echo,' while system loyalists warn of mass delusion. Underlying issues remain, but authority has shifted irreversibly.
